trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de pintura do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> objeto é usado para definir as propriedades do gráfico durante o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> eventos o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> propriedade permite que você posicione os elementos do gráfico e o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> propriedade facilita as operações de desenho GDI+.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> propriedade fornece o acesso de desenvolvedor para a raiz <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objeto, que pode ser usado para definir várias propriedades do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> propriedade permite que o desenvolvedor definir as propriedades do gráfico durante o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> eventos o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object for the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto para o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the chart element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o elemento do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to:
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade do objeto durante um evento de pintura para:

trans-unit.source: Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Ajuda com a conversão em coordenadas relativas e/ou absoluto do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Executar desenho personalizado usando um GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade do objeto durante um evento de pintura para posicionar um elemento de gráfico.
